scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS MONGODB_USERNAME=$OPENSHIFT_MONGODB_DB_USERNAME MONGODB_PASSWORD=$OPENSHIFT_MONGODB_DB_PASSWORD MONGODB_HOST=$OPENSHIFT_MONGODB_DB_HOST MONGODB_PORT=$OPENSHIFT_MONGODB_DB_PORT MONGODB_DB=brain bin/hubot -n Hubot -a shell
